newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico mourns passing of China's Deng.
newsitem.headline: Mexico mourns passing of China's Deng.

text.p: Mexico said on Wednesday it mourned the death of Chinese paramount leader Deng Xiaoping, calling his passing "an irreparable loss."

"Mexico acknowledges the stature and the political leadership of the visionary Chinese leader in managing the destiny of modern China and his contribution to peace and world detente," the Foreign Ministry said in a statement.
"The government of Mexico joins in the deep grief of the people and government of the People's Republic of China for the irreparable loss."
